originalText.text: üòÄI‚Äôve been wearing locs now for the past 3 years, and only recently discovered Tyra over the last 6 months.  I love her shop, it‚Äôs small, quiet, quaint, and the energy is always positive.  My hair grows very slow, and my locs were very dry & they felt hard.  About 2 months ago, Tyra provided me with some hair growth oil she created and gave me great tips on how to maintain my locs.  It‚Äôs only been a short while, but my hair is definitely a lot softer; me and my husband both enjoy touching it  now..lol

originalText.text: I had the opportunity to get my locs colored, styled and re twisted by Tyra. Not only is she warm and friendly, she listens attentively. She‚Äôs also very thorough and fast with her work. The shop itself had very good energy. It was also easy to find. Booking was simple and straightforward through her site. It was a 10/10 experience I highly recommend her services. I will definitely go back.

text.text: I had the opportunity to get my locs colored, styled and re twisted by Tyra. Not only is she warm and friendly, she listens attentively. She‚Äôs also very thorough and fast with her work. The shop itself had very good energy. It was also easy to find. Booking was simple and straightforward through her site. It was a 10/10 experience I highly recommend her services. I will definitely go back.

originalText.text: Great experience with Tyra. I found her very warm and welcoming. I‚Äôve had locs for over 20 years and have been doing my hair myself for most of that time. It was so nice to sit back and let Tyra work her magic! She listened and empathized with my concerns, provided great conversation and did a fantastic job! I look forward to being a regular customer!

text.text: Great experience with Tyra. I found her very warm and welcoming. I‚Äôve had locs for over 20 years and have been doing my hair myself for most of that time. It was so nice to sit back and let Tyra work her magic! She listened and empathized with my concerns, provided great conversation and did a fantastic job! I look forward to being a regular customer!

originalText.text:
Don‚Äôt regret going to Tyra for my locs, and honestly wished I did my starter locs with her. The last salon I went to didn‚Äôt do a very good job, and I decided to give her a try. Immediately, she noticed I have starter locs, and locked my hair immediately. Since then, I haven't had any problems with my locs unraveling since, and her hair products helped my hair grow faster, which are also 100% natural ingredients!

She is very patient and calm, makes the atmosphere soothing, and knows how to start a great conversation. Definitely recommend Tyra as my loctician!

originalText.text:
I do not recommend this stylist. She is not a celebrity stylist. If you want your hair done the correct way and to last more than 2-3 days, spend your money elsewhere!
On 07/21/2022

I accepted an appointment with a loc shop named,‚ÄùLocs NYC to Miami‚Äù with stylist Tyra. On 07/21/2022, I received a ACV detox, hot oil treatment, and a re-twist. By 07/23/2022 majority of my locs unraveled, and it appeared as if I had my locs done more than 5 weeks vs. only  2-3days(07/21/2022-07/23/2022).On 07/23, I spoke with Tyra regarding a refund for the current condition of my hair. Tyra indicated the reason for majority of my locs unraveling, and the state of my hair is due to sweat, or previous loctician hair products. Tyra went on to advertise the ingredients for her own hair care products used on her clients specified as water-based products. Tyra specified over the phone that she would not refund any of the money ($275 )paid to her on 07/21/2022 for the services rendered. I contacted Tyra via telephone, and text message requesting a notice in writing via email that she is not going to provide a refund on 07/23/2022. Tyra as of 00:03:46pm on 07/23/2022 has yet to respond to my refund policy request. I do not recommend this stylist. She is not a celebrity stylist. If you want your hair done the correct way and to last more than 2-3 days, spend your money elsewhere!

RESPONSE TO STYLIST TYRA REPLY AFTER MY ORIGINAL NEGATIVE REVIEW

Tyra is twisting the truth to appease her lack of accountability, poor customer service, and LACK of loctician skills. If this picture is literally 2-3 days old why does my hair look like this (view pictures above) my hair should not look this way after paying $275 including a $20 TIP.  The LAME excuses made by Tyra would never be stated by real beauticians let a lone locticians who produce QUALITY work.  If you clearly review the photos attached, the parts are not neat, more than ONE lock is unraveled and are not even tightened. I‚Äôm sure your current clients locs do not look 3 or more months old after only 2-3 days. Sloppy work. Tyra should stop categorizing herself and work as ‚Äúcelebrity status‚Äù or stop doing hair all together accountability for a poor job and poor work is too much to bargain. You mislead new and potential clients when you lie and attempt to make yourself to be something your not‚Ä¶. It‚Äôs not honest and fair to customers who are willing to pay for the work they should get!!! Again I  will continue to let everyone know how horrible you are as a business woman and a stylist. I now have to spend more money elsewhere to get my hair done after paying you $275 for this horrible job you did!!!  And FYI- the exact ‚Äúaccommodations‚Äù TYRA is referring to is (and I quote) 1.)‚Äù tyra is unable to confirm the next appointment time she is able to be in NY to fix the horrible work she did while playing in my hair(nor an exact date, tyra claimed ‚Äúmaybe a few weeks I don‚Äôt know.‚Äù 2.) Tyra refused to refund any portion of the $275 paid to her on 07/21 not only for horrible work but also customer service. To tyra, you can put up a facade for social media and these platforms but you are aware that the work you produced was horrible in quality and customer service. I paid $275 and literally my hair looks 2 or more months old. You won‚Äôt win in life mistreating your own culture. Black woman like you won‚Äôt learn until your hands no longer work to produce business and you no longer are able to produce work out of your shop.
